title: Who Is a Cancer Woman Most Compatible With? 5 of Her Best Love Matches

steps.title: Scorpio, Pisces, Taurus, Capricorn, and Virgo.
steps.content: Scorpio, Pisces, Taurus, Capricorn, and Virgo. A Cancer woman is driven by her feelings, so she craves intensity and emotional intelligence. Other water signs, like Scorpio and Pisces, allow her to express herself without holding back. She also benefits from caretaking and stability, qualities that come naturally for earth signs like Taurus, Capricorn, and Virgo. Astrologer Angel Eyedealism emphasizes the particular draw that a Cancer woman may have to Capricorn energy "because it's Cancer's opposite sign." Since water signs are so sensitive, they’ll be completely understanding of each other’s reactions and mood changes. When a Scorpio or Pisces witnesses Cancer in the throes of love or agony, they’ll be inspired by her authenticity. Earth signs are grounded and bring balance to water signs. [1] X Research source Since Cancer tends to give so much of herself to other people, Taurus, Capricorn, and Virgo recharge her.

steps.title: A Cancer woman and Scorpio have a bond that’s unparalleled.
steps.content: A Cancer woman and Scorpio have a bond that’s unparalleled. When Cancer encounters Scorpio, it seems like long-lost soulmates reuniting—Scorpio, who usually feels misunderstood or too impassioned, feels cherished by Cancer. [2] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Cancer is in total awe of Scorpio and voices how thankful she is to be completely unfiltered. Together, they experience the whole spectrum of emotions, from bliss to sorrow. Cancer will find Scorpio’s intensity and passion incredibly intoxicating. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Both Scorpio and Cancer are influenced by the Moon, so they find it normal to go through phases. They also like the fluidity they both experience and can talk about all their different moods. In previous relationships, Cancer and Scorpio felt like they needed to hide their true selves. When these water signs meet up, they know they’re truly “seen.”

steps.title: These two water signs make a fiery match in the bedroom.
steps.content: These two water signs make a fiery match in the bedroom. [4] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Cancer and Scorpio see sex as a medium to capture their emotions for each other—as they grow closer, their desire and enthusiasm for one another will only heighten over time. They want to make the most of every opportunity to prove their passion for each other, and physical intimacy is one of their favorite means to make a hot and unforgettable statement. A Cancer woman also has a chance to play with her vulnerable side and explore power dynamics with a Scorpio. Scorpio can impress her with their natural dominance and their “take charge” approach. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Usually, Cancer will look to sex as a way to feel security and reassurance in the relationship. Scorpio is happy to be very attentive in bed in order to soothe her.

steps.title: Cancer and Scorpio intuit each other’s feelings and embrace intensity.
steps.content: Cancer and Scorpio intuit each other’s feelings and embrace intensity. Water signs are incredible empaths and are usually so tapped into people’s emotions that they’re almost psychic. When Scorpio and Cancer come together, they make use of all their natural abilities and can easily pick up on their partner’s mood. Whether they’re in the same room or far apart, they somehow know exactly what their lover is going through. Scorpio and Cancer are also very spiritual, so they’ll notice their psychic connection and celebrate it. These two water signs also have a high level of endurance for chaos and complications, so they’ll offer each other solace when life gets difficult.

steps.title: A Cancer and a Pisces thrive together since they long for devotion.
steps.content: A Cancer and a Pisces thrive together since they long for devotion. Pisces and Cancer have been swimming through life in search of a fairytale romance—they both fantasize about a partner who will stay for the long haul. According to Astrologer Angel Eyedealism, the best first date for a Cancer and Pisces is "a seafood dinner involving crab or lobster. Pisces is ruled by Neptune and Neptune rules the sea. And Cancer is ruled by the moon. So they're both very sensitive to the environment and would do well in an intimate corner of a dimly lit restaurant with soft music playing." This will set a perfect mood so that when they dive into deep talks during their dates, their hearts will warm when they hear that they both have the same desires and goals for a relationship. [6] X Research source As two water signs, Pisces and Cancer are very imaginative and constantly think about love. They’ll be excited to picture a perfect future together. Cancer and Pisces take their time to find the right match. They’ll enjoy investing in each other, remaining exclusive, and exploring their connection.

steps.title: These two water signs are gentle and caring as lovers.
steps.content: These two water signs are gentle and caring as lovers. A Cancer woman is more reserved and shy—she prefers to become intimate when she truly trusts her partner. Pisces is also selective and explores sexuality only when they feel fully ready. Once Cancer and Pisces are ready to take the next step, Pisces acts as Cancer’s guide and encourages her to experiment. At first, Pisces’ desire for adventure and novelty will surprise Cancer. Once Cancer warms up to Pisces, she’ll be excited to try out new ways to express herself in the bedroom. Cancer finds it easy to open up to Pisces because Pisces is skilled at treating her to loving touch and affection.

steps.title: Cancer and Pisces want to maintain harmony in their dynamic.
steps.content: Cancer and Pisces want to maintain harmony in their dynamic. Ultimately, what matters to Pisces and Cancer is sustainability—they’re willing to do whatever it takes to hold onto each other. Cancer gets to play the part of the nurturer, and Pisces gets to be truly vulnerable. Cancer often pours her energy into making sure Pisces is well taken care of, but both water signs like it that way. As a creative and artistic sign, Pisces can sometimes act like a martyr, but Cancer finds that charming. Cancer adores doting on Pisces and providing comfort whenever it’s needed. Pisces has a knack for expressing gratitude, so Cancer won’t feel overlooked. In fact, Pisces will call her their muse and completely cherish her.

steps.title: Cancer and Taurus work so well because they focus on security.
steps.content: Cancer and Taurus work so well because they focus on security. Astrologer Angel Eyedealism emphasizes, "Cancers are the mother of the zodiac and experience a unique sense of emotional duty." Taurus, on the other hand, offers security in the form of career and professional ambition. These two domestic signs balance each other and dream of domestic bliss, so they enjoy an amazing initial spark when they discuss their goals. When Taurus compliments Cancer for her cooking, interior decorating, and conversational skills, she feels like she’s on top of the world. A Cancer woman certainly notices Taurus’ knack for making money. She finds Taurus’ work ethic and discipline charming. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Taurus and Cancer both see each other as investments and prefer to date each other exclusively to nurture their connection. Reader Poll: We asked 326 wikiHow readers and 91% of them agreed that Cancers are generally family-oriented . [Take Poll] This domestic quality is shared by Tauruses, making this a promising match!

steps.title: These signs worship each other when they make love.
steps.content: These signs worship each other when they make love. While they don’t pursue each other for a sexual connection, Cancer and Taurus fall hard once they take their relationship to a physical level. Both Taurus and Cancer are “givers” who thrive on satisfying their partner. When they express their passion for each other, they’ll each feel fully adored. Cancer and Taurus are exquisitely sensual and value that about each other. Scent, touch, sound, appearance, and taste all factor into their experience. [8] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. For example, a Cancer woman will wear an intoxicating perfume while a Taurus will butter her up with high-end chocolates. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. The earth sign and water sign are also incredibly mindful and concentrate on how to enhance each other’s pleasure.

steps.title: Cancer and Taurus have a solid vision for the future.
steps.content: Cancer and Taurus have a solid vision for the future. These two signs find it easy to split tasks and prepare for a long-term relationship that will stand the test of time. They can both discuss budgets without batting an eye and they’re eager to discuss what cohabitation would look like. While other signs in the zodiac may avoid talking about stability because they find it “dry,” these chats make watery Cancer and earthy Taurus melt. [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Taurus and Cancer share the same values because they believe in focusing on their finances and their performance at work. They also enjoy planning their vacations and how to splurge once they’ve saved up enough money. A Cancer woman and a Taurus feel really optimistic when they’re in a relationship because they adore how responsible their partner is.

steps.title: Cancer and Capricorn complement each other with their differences.
steps.content: Cancer and Capricorn complement each other with their differences. Capricorn is really straight-laced and serious while Cancer is very creative and emotional. Though these signs seem to have opposite personalities, Cancer and Capricorn experience a strong initial attraction. Earthy Capricorn sees that Cancer offers sensitivity, and watery Cancer is sure that Capricorn provides patience. A Cancer woman is a positive influence on a Capricorn and encourages the earth sign to develop their emotional intelligence. A Capricorn enhances Cancer’s psychological wellbeing because Capricorn is so reliable and calms any of Cancer’s doubts or fears.

steps.title: The earth sign and water sign are masters of build-up and foreplay.
steps.content: The earth sign and water sign are masters of build-up and foreplay. When it comes to sex, neither sign is interested in rushing each other. Cancer shows warmth with affection and meaningful conversations, which allows the sometimes cold and guarded Capricorn to thaw. Capricorn proves their respect for Cancer and lets the water sign initiate intimacy only once she’s ready—this allows her to fully relax and open up once they make love. [11] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Since Capricorn and Cancer invest so much time in getting to know one another, their intimacy will be mind-blowing. A Cancer woman enjoys that Capricorn finally discovers passion and vulnerability when they’re in her arms.

steps.title: Cancer and Capricorn have opposing outlooks but remain supportive.
steps.content: Cancer and Capricorn have opposing outlooks but remain supportive. Capricorn is really practical and likes to stick to the facts. [12] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. However, Cancer is imaginative and prefers to lead with emotions. While their approach to life is different, they listen to each other intently and take each other’s perspective seriously. Since they want to keep their partner in their life, Capricorn and Cancer are aware that they’ll have to consider each other’s opinions and values to truly stick it out. Over time, Cancer and Capricorn perfect their communication skills. They'll find a great rhythm because they’ll be so used to asking each other questions. Cancer will look to Capricorn for advice since Capricorn loves to help out. Eventually, Capricorn will rely on Cancer for getting in touch with their emotions.

steps.title: Cancer and Virgo share a bond based on patience and respect.
steps.content: Cancer and Virgo share a bond based on patience and respect. When they first date, Virgo and Cancer will definitely challenge each other—Virgo will come across as emotionless to a Cancer woman, while she’ll look impulsive to Virgo. Once they both learn how much they value loyalty and devotion, however, both signs will find each other endearing and want to explore a romantic connection. As soon as each sign admits they’re looking for a life partner, they’ll slow down and take notes about how to work well with one another. Virgo is extremely perceptive and picks up on everything. [13] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. This will work out in Cancer’s favor because she needs an observant partner. Virgo will realize that a Cancer woman requires an active listener, while she’ll acknowledge that Virgo seeks a partner who's open to compromise. [14] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019.

steps.title: The water sign and earth sign need plenty of time to open up sexually.
steps.content: The water sign and earth sign need plenty of time to open up sexually. Neither Cancer nor Virgo have sex on their mind when they pursue each other—instead, all they’ll want to do is chat and enjoy each other’s company. Luckily, that means that they’ll have lots of opportunities to discuss their expectations and boundaries. Once Virgo and Cancer feel sure that they know what their partner wants, they’ll explore intimacy with each other. Virgo is ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication, so the earth sign is impressed with Cancer’s willingness to talk about intimacy in advance. [15] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Both signs are people-pleasers that sometimes feel pressured by others, so Cancer and Virgo will appreciate that they can go at their own pace. Virgo will be amazed that they can just let go and be in touch with their body with Cancer. She’ll love that she has this powerful effect on the earth sign.

steps.title: Cancer and Virgo always express their love for each other.
steps.content: Cancer and Virgo always express their love for each other. Despite their differences, both signs are incredibly soft-hearted and require lots of reassurance to thrive in a relationship. This won’t be a problem for these two lovers, because both are kind and compassionate souls that want to soothe their partner. A Cancer woman and a Virgo can look forward to a future full of support and emotional safety. Virgo will focus on providing balance when Cancer experiences mood changes. Cancer will point out when Virgo isn’t paying attention to their own needs. Both will prove their dedication to one another by adapting to the other sign. Virgo will take emotions more seriously, and Cancer will embrace Virgo’s logic.
